As of so far, yes. The Game is fun but it can be very triggering watching a killer wait for you to die on the hook. Another thing that is triggering is the loading times. As A surviver The game can find matches easy. But when A killer the match times are longer. Some of the good stuff is the simple controls. It doesn't take long for someone to understand how to play. But one thing that can be hard to learn is the perks, And there is alot of them. But once you do understand the perks you will have a good time playing this game. If anyone wants to add on to this review please do so.

The game is fun overall, whether its a low ranked killer you're messing around with or..... its just a toxic end summary chat where the killer calls you a tryhard or baby. This game is enjoyable until a Bubba (Leatherface) holds Mouse2 and facecamps you the whole game because yes..... yes there are people like this, its horrible. But other than that you can SWF (survive with friends) and laugh your asses of together and escape.

— Есть определенные правила, которые необходимо соблюдать, чтоб выжить в фильме ужасов. Например:
№1. Ты никогда не должен заниматься сексом. Расслабился — считай, уже покойник. Секс всегда заканчивается смертью.
№2. Никогда не пей и не принимай наркотики. Фактор греха. Это в дополнение к первому номеру.
№3. Никогда, никогда-никогда, ни при каких обстоятельствах не говори: «Я сейчас вернусь».

I have owned this game since release. I have 320 hours as well as have gotten to both Rank 1 killer and Rank 1 survivor multiple times. As much I have enjoyed this game over the years, in it's current state I cannot recommend the game to anyone that wants to play on this game as a survivor; maybe even as a killer. Why? Because the game is simply just not fun most of the time. The developers stay nerfing survivors and buffing killers because "Being a killer is too difficult." So, they nerf survivor mobility, addons, perks, etc. But survivors are only that strong when playing in a coordinated, survive with friends group. Which I understand, a stronng portion of the player base probably does. But with their changes, playing a survivor alone and getting out is extremely unfun, partly also due to unbalanced killers, such as the spirit. I'm not going to go into too many details. But, for example, possibly the worst change they've ever made is the killer lock-on swings. It is practically impossible to miss a swing on a survivor from close range because it literally aims for you and you lunge so fast and far, the only way you miss is if you're inexperienced at all; and by that I mean if you have less than like 10 hours on killer. It completely removes any skill from that aspect of killer, which in turn also makes it unfun imo. 
I used to be able to play this game an entire day... now, I can barely play for a few hours without getting frustrated at killers, desync, shitty server lag, or unbalanced perks.

What would it take for me to consider this game fun and to recommend it again? Either a lot of reverts, or almost an overhaul. DBD 2.0 basically. Most games just feel wayyy to one sided right now. Either the killer stomps and the survivors play ready up simulator (que times in this game have gotten longer for some reason), or the survivors are really good SWF and the killer doesn't have fun at all.

Probably the most fun multiplayer game on steam. In my opinion, yes the game is unbalanced and there is a somewhat toxic community but that's what makes the game fun. If you are going to get butthurt about the killer killing you and camping then just get better at the game and learn the ways around it like borrowed time. Overall best game I've played in a long time and I don't plan on stopping any time soon.

If you like being toxic, play as a Survivor(You get handheld by the game, everything is made to be as easy as possible and people in this category tend to taunt and troll the Killer). If you like getting trolled and getting matched against toxic people, play Killer(You are essentially a nerfed, pathetic excuse for a serial killer that's about as harmful as an annoying mosquito.)

The developers intentionally favor their toxic survivor community, due to money and WABing. With a 4-to-1 ratio of Survivor to Killer customers, they will always take the money and give them anything and everything they want in order to keep them playing. On the other hand, Killers are left to rot. Perks tend to be very, very specialized, and any decent bonus comes with an equally if not even worse negative effect to deal with. Most killers with interesting abilities are extremely predictable or have ridiculous charge times on their abilities, making it extremely difficult to use them effectively(Case and point, Hillbilly has a loud ass chainsaw he will spend a good five seconds revving, before yeeting himself in a somewhat straight line and downing whatever he touches. All it takes is a quick half second turn from the survivor you are chasing to move the fuck out of the way, and run while you spend the next hour and a half recovering from your ability.

Don't buy this game. The more you support these devs, the more toxic they'll make their community.

Anti-fun. this game looks and plays like garbage. the main gameplay boils down to having the right perks from grinding litteral hours of boring survivor quicktime event "gameplay" just so you can unlock the one move that the character is worth playing for, so you can use it on another character that is in meta. 
Wanna have fun playing a killer? Fork over some $$$ and you can have the privilege of sitting by yourself in a que time for about a half an hour before one player joins. just for that player to have level 50 in all the best characters and have them abuse shit hitboxes and abuse the crap movement system.

Just avoid this game, the devs have absolutely no idea what they're doing and they wasted the chance to make something good.
